Home›Calculators›Math Calculators›Percentage calculator

Percentage Calculator (%)

What is % of ?
is what % of ? %
is % of what?
What is the percentage change
from to ?
%
Percent:     Fraction:   Decimal:  
%

Percentage calculations

Percentage of a value calculation

What is 20% of $60?

20% is 20/100 mutiplied by $60:

20% × $60 =
20100
× $60 = 0.2 × $60 = $12

Percentage calculation

$12 is what percent of $60?

$12 is divided by $60 and multiplied by 100%:

$12$60
× 100% = 20%

Whole value calculation

$12 is 20% of what?

$12 is divided by 20%:

$1220%
=
$1220
× 100 = $60

Percentage change calculation

What is the percentage change from $40 to $50?

The difference between $50 and $40 is divided by $40 and multiplied by 100%:

$50 - $40$40
× 100% = 0.25 × 100% = 25%
